content: **size** one size **measurements** height approx 22 cm / 8 6 **materials** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude 1 skein of color 03 pica pau cotton 8/7 1 skein of color 09 1 skein of color 27 1 skein of color 32 1 skein of color 35 1 skein of color 37 crochet hook 2 75 mm / us c2 2 safety eyes 10 mm stuffing tapestry needle stitch marker **yarn quality** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds pica pau cotton 8/7 hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds **pattern information** dylan ladybug is an intermediate project worked in a continuous spiral to keep track of the rounds you may use a stitch marker or safety pin to mark the beginning of a round dylan ladybug also has 2 accessories a hat and a pair of boots remember that it s always advisable to give the entire pattern a read before starting crocheting and most importantly be patient with yourself **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6
